mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS c_id , c.u_id AS c_u_id , c.title AS c_title , c.content , c.cdate AS c_cdate , c.udate AS c_udate , c.ps_id AS c_ps_id , uhc.t_id , uhc.status , t.name AS t_name FROM linker.user_has_card AS uhc JOIN linker.card c ON uhc.c_id = c.id JOIN linker.team_has_user AS thu ON thu.t_id = uhc.t_id JOIN linker.team AS t ON t.id = thu.t_id JOIN linker.project AS p ON p.id = uhc.p_id WHERE uhc.u_id =#{u_id} AND c.ps_id = 1 AND t.status = 0 AND p.ps_id = 1 AND thu.u_id=#{u_id}
